data RealtimeEndpointInfo

-- | <a>RealtimeEndpointInfo</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>reiCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>reiEndpointStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RealtimeEndpointStatus</a></li>
--   <li><a>reiEndpointUrl</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>reiPeakRequestsPerSecond</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Int</a></li>
--   </ul>
realtimeEndpointInfo :: RealtimeEndpointInfo

-- | The time that the request to create the real-time endpoint for the
--   <a>MLModel</a> was received. The time is expressed in epoch time.
reiCreatedAt :: Lens' RealtimeEndpointInfo (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The current status of the real-time endpoint for the <a>MLModel</a>.
--   This element can have one of the following values:
--   
--   NONE - Endpoint does not exist or was previously deleted. READY -
--   Endpoint is ready to be used for real-time predictions. UPDATING -
--   Updating/creating the endpoint.
reiEndpointStatus :: Lens' RealtimeEndpointInfo (Maybe RealtimeEndpointStatus)

-- | The URI that specifies where to send real-time prediction requests for
--   the <a>MLModel</a>.
--   
--   Note The application must wait until the real-time endpoint is ready
--   before using this URI.
reiEndpointUrl :: Lens' RealtimeEndpointInfo (Maybe Text)

-- | The maximum processing rate for the real-time endpoint for
--   <a>MLModel</a>, measured in incoming requests per second.
reiPeakRequestsPerSecond :: Lens' RealtimeEndpointInfo (Maybe Int)
data Prediction

-- | <a>Prediction</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>

--   </ul>
prediction :: Prediction
pDetails :: Lens' Prediction (HashMap DetailsAttributes Text)

-- | The prediction label for either a BINARY or MULTICLASS <a>MLModel</a>.
pPredictedLabel :: Lens' Prediction (Maybe Text)
pPredictedScores :: Lens' Prediction (HashMap Text Double)

-- | The prediction value for REGRESSION <a>MLModel</a>.
pPredictedValue :: Lens' Prediction (Maybe Double)

s3DataSpec :: Text -> S3DataSpec

-- | The location of the data file(s) used by a <a>DataSource</a>. The URI
--   specifies a data file or an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3)
--   directory or bucket containing data files.
sdsDataLocationS3 :: Lens' S3DataSpec Text

sdsDataSchema :: Lens' S3DataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the schema Location in Amazon S3.
sdsDataSchemaLocationS3 :: Lens' S3DataSpec (Maybe Text)

data RDSDataSpec

-- | <a>RDSDataSpec</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdsdsDataRearrangement</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>

--   <li><a>rdsdsDataSchemaUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdsDatabaseCredentials</a> <tt>::</tt>
--   <a>RDSDatabaseCredentials</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdsDatabaseInformation</a> <tt>::</tt>
--   <a>RDSDatabase</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdsResourceRole</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdsS3StagingLocation</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdsSecurityGroupIds</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>

--   <li><a>rdsdsServiceRole</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdsSubnetId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
rdsdataSpec :: RDSDatabase -> Text -> RDSDatabaseCredentials -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> RDSDataSpec

-- | DataRearrangement - A JSON string that represents the splitting
--   requirement of a <a>DataSource</a>.
--   
--   Sample - '
--   "{"randomSeed":"some-random-seed","splitting":{"percentBegin":10,"percentEnd":60}}"'
rdsdsDataRearrangement :: Lens' RDSDataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | A JSON string that represents the schema. This is not required if
--   <tt>DataSchemaUri</tt> is specified.
rdsdsDataSchema :: Lens' RDSDataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon S3 location of the <tt>DataSchema</tt>.
rdsdsDataSchemaUri :: Lens' RDSDataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | The AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) credentials that are used
--   connect to the Amazon RDS database.
rdsdsDatabaseCredentials :: Lens' RDSDataSpec RDSDatabaseCredentials

-- | Describes the <tt>DatabaseName</tt> and <tt>InstanceIdentifier</tt> of
--   an an Amazon RDS database.
rdsdsDatabaseInformation :: Lens' RDSDataSpec RDSDatabase

-- | The role (DataPipelineDefaultResourceRole) assumed by an Amazon
--   Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance to carry out the copy
--   operation from Amazon RDS to an Amazon S3 task. For more information,
--   see <a>Role templates</a> for data pipelines.
rdsdsResourceRole :: Lens' RDSDataSpec Text

-- | The Amazon S3 location for staging Amazon RDS data. The data retrieved
--   from Amazon RDS using <tt>SelectSqlQuery</tt> is stored in this
--   location.
rdsdsS3StagingLocation :: Lens' RDSDataSpec Text

-- | The security group IDs to be used to access a VPC-based RDS DB
--   instance. Ensure that there are appropriate ingress rules set up to
--   allow access to the RDS DB instance. This attribute is used by Data
--   Pipeline to carry out the copy operation from Amazon RDS to an Amazon
--   S3 task.
rdsdsSecurityGroupIds :: Lens' RDSDataSpec [Text]

-- | The query that is used to retrieve the observation data for the
--   <a>DataSource</a>.
rdsdsSelectSqlQuery :: Lens' RDSDataSpec Text

-- | The role (DataPipelineDefaultRole) assumed by AWS Data Pipeline
--   service to monitor the progress of the copy task from Amazon RDS to
--   Amazon S3. For more information, see <a>Role templates</a> for data
--   pipelines.
rdsdsServiceRole :: Lens' RDSDataSpec Text

-- | The subnet ID to be used to access a VPC-based RDS DB instance. This
--   attribute is used by Data Pipeline to carry out the copy task from
--   Amazon RDS to Amazon S3.
rdsdsSubnetId :: Lens' RDSDataSpec Text

rdsmetadata :: RDSMetadata

-- | The ID of the Data Pipeline instance that is used to carry to copy
--   data from Amazon RDS to Amazon S3. You can use the ID to find details
--   about the instance in the Data Pipeline console.
rdsmDataPipelineId :: Lens' RDSMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The database details required to connect to an Amazon RDS.

rdsmDatabaseUserName :: Lens' RDSMetadata (Maybe Text)

--   instance to carry out the copy task from Amazon RDS to Amazon S3. For
--   more information, see <a>Role templates</a> for data pipelines.
rdsmResourceRole :: Lens' RDSMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The SQL query that is supplied during
--   <tt>CreateDataSourceFromRDS</tt>. Returns only if <tt>Verbose</tt> is
--   true in <tt>GetDataSourceInput</tt>.
rdsmSelectSqlQuery :: Lens' RDSMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The role (DataPipelineDefaultRole) assumed by the Data Pipeline
--   service to monitor the progress of the copy task from Amazon RDS to
--   Amazon S3. For more information, see <a>Role templates</a> for data
--   pipelines.
rdsmServiceRole :: Lens' RDSMetadata (Maybe Text)

data MLModel

-- | <a>MLModel</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>mlmAlgorithm</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Algorithm</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmEndpointInfo</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RealtimeEndpointInfo</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmInputDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmMLModelType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>MLModelType</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmScoreThreshold</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Double</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmScoreThresholdLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmSizeInBytes</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Integer</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmTrainingDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>mlmTrainingParameters</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>HashMap</a>
--   <a>Text</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
mlmodel :: MLModel

-- | The algorithm used to train the <a>MLModel</a>. The following
--   algorithm is supported:
--   
--   SGD -- Stochastic gradient descent. The goal of SGD is to minimize the
--   gradient of the loss function.
mlmAlgorithm :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Algorithm)

-- | The time that the <a>MLModel</a> was created. The time is expressed in
--   epoch time.
mlmCreatedAt :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account from which the <a>MLModel</a> was created. The
--   account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and
--   Access Management (IAM) user account.
mlmCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Text)

-- | The current endpoint of the <a>MLModel</a>.
mlmEndpointInfo :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe RealtimeEndpointInfo)

-- | The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage
--   Service (Amazon S3).
mlmInputDataLocationS3 :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>MLModel</a>. The time is
--   expressed in epoch time.
mlmLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>MLModel</a> at creation.
mlmMLModelId :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Text)

-- | Identifies the <a>MLModel</a> category. The following are the
--   available types:
--   
--   REGRESSION - Produces a numeric result. For example, "What listing
--   price should a house have?". BINARY - Produces one of two possible
--   results. For example, "Is this a child-friendly web site?". MULTICLASS
--   - Produces more than two possible results. For example, "Is this a
--   HIGH, LOW or MEDIUM risk trade?".
mlmMLModelType :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe MLModelType)

-- | A description of the most recent details about accessing the
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
mlmMessage :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>MLModel</a>.
mlmName :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Text)
mlmScoreThreshold :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Double)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <tt>ScoreThreshold</tt>. The
--   time is expressed in epoch time.
mlmScoreThresholdLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe UTCTime)
mlmSizeInBytes :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Integer)

-- | The current status of an <a>MLModel</a>. This element can have one of
--   the following values:
--   
--   PENDING - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a request to
--   create an <a>MLModel</a>. INPROGRESS - The creation process is
--   underway. FAILED - The request to create an <a>MLModel</a> did not run
--   to completion. It is not usable. COMPLETED - The creation process
--   completed successfully. DELETED - The <a>MLModel</a> is marked as
--   deleted. It is not usable.
mlmStatus :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe EntityStatus)

-- | The ID of the training <a>DataSource</a>. The <tt>CreateMLModel</tt>
--   operation uses the <tt>TrainingDataSourceId</tt>.
mlmTrainingDataSourceId :: Lens' MLModel (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of the training parameters in the <a>MLModel</a>. The list is
--   implemented as a map of key/value pairs.
--   
--   The following is the current set of training parameters:
--   
--   'sgd.l1RegularizationAmount' - Coefficient regularization L1 norm. It
--   controls overfitting the data by penalizing large coefficients. This
--   tends to drive coefficients to zero, resulting in a sparse feature
--   set. If you use this parameter, specify a small value, such as 1.0E-04
--   or 1.0E-08.
--   
--   The value is a double that ranges from 0 to MAX_DOUBLE. The default is
--   not to use L1 normalization. The parameter cannot be used when
--   <tt>L2</tt> is specified. Use this parameter sparingly.
--   
--   'sgd.l2RegularizationAmount' - Coefficient regularization L2 norm. It
--   controls overfitting the data by penalizing large coefficients. This
--   tends to drive coefficients to small, nonzero values. If you use this
--   parameter, specify a small value, such as 1.0E-04 or 1.0E-08.
--   
--   The valus is a double that ranges from 0 to MAX_DOUBLE. The default is
--   not to use L2 normalization. This cannot be used when <tt>L1</tt> is
--   specified. Use this parameter sparingly.
--   
--   'sgd.maxPasses' - Number of times that the training process traverses
--   the observations to build the <a>MLModel</a>. The value is an integer
--   that ranges from 1 to 10000. The default value is 10.
--   
--   'sgd.maxMLModelSizeInBytes' - Maximum allowed size of the model.
--   Depending on the input data, the model size might affect performance.
--   
--   The value is an integer that ranges from 100000 to 2147483648. The
--   default value is 33554432.
mlmTrainingParameters :: Lens' MLModel (HashMap Text Text)
data BatchPrediction

-- | <a>BatchPrediction</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>bpBatchPredictionDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>

--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpInputDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpOutputUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>bpStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   </ul>
batchPrediction :: BatchPrediction

-- | The ID of the <a>DataSource</a> that points to the group of
--   observations to predict.
bpBatchPredictionDataSourceId :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>BatchPrediction</a> at creation. This value
--   should be identical to the value of the <tt>BatchPredictionID</tt> in
--   the request.
bpBatchPredictionId :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | The time that the <a>BatchPrediction</a> was created. The time is
--   expressed in epoch time.
bpCreatedAt :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account that invoked the <a>BatchPrediction</a>. The
--   account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and
--   Access Management (IAM) user account.
bpCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage
--   Service (Amazon S3).
bpInputDataLocationS3 :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>BatchPrediction</a>. The
--   time is expressed in epoch time.
bpLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID of the <a>MLModel</a> that generated predictions for the
--   <a>BatchPrediction</a> request.
bpMLModelId :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | A description of the most recent details about processing the batch
--   prediction request.
bpMessage :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>BatchPrediction</a>.
bpName :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | The location of an Amazon S3 bucket or directory to receive the
--   operation results. The following substrings are not allowed in the s3
--   key portion of the "outputURI" field: <tt>:</tt>, <tt>//</tt>,
--   <tt>/./</tt>, <tt>/../</tt>.
bpOutputUri :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe Text)

-- | The status of the <a>BatchPrediction</a>. This element can have one of
--   the following values:
--   
--   <tt>PENDING</tt> - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a
--   request to generate predictions for a batch of observations.
--   <tt>INPROGRESS</tt> - The process is underway. <tt>FAILED</tt> - The
--   request to peform a batch prediction did not run to completion. It is
--   not usable. <tt>COMPLETED</tt> - The batch prediction process
--   completed successfully. <tt>DELETED</tt> - The <a>BatchPrediction</a>
--   is marked as deleted. It is not usable.
bpStatus :: Lens' BatchPrediction (Maybe EntityStatus)
data SortOrder

-- | asc
Asc :: SortOrder

-- | dsc
Dsc :: SortOrder
data Algorithm

-- | sgd
Sgd :: Algorithm
data EntityStatus

-- | COMPLETED
ESCompleted :: EntityStatus

-- | DELETED
ESDeleted :: EntityStatus

-- | FAILED
ESFailed :: EntityStatus

-- | INPROGRESS
ESInprogress :: EntityStatus

-- | PENDING
ESPending :: EntityStatus
data DataSource

-- | <a>DataSource</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dsComputeStatistics</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsDataRearrangement</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsDataSizeInBytes</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Integer</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsNumberOfFiles</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Integer</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsRDSMetadata</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RDSMetadata</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsRedshiftMetadata</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RedshiftMetadata</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsRoleARN</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   </ul>
dataSource :: DataSource

-- | The parameter is <tt>true</tt> if statistics need to be generated from
--   the observation data.
dsComputeStatistics :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Bool)

-- | The time that the <a>DataSource</a> was created. The time is expressed
--   in epoch time.
dsCreatedAt :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account from which the <a>DataSource</a> was created. The
--   account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and
--   Access Management (IAM) user account.
dsCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The location and name of the data in Amazon Simple Storage Service
--   (Amazon S3) that is used by a <a>DataSource</a>.
dsDataLocationS3 :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | A JSON string that represents the splitting requirement of a
--   <tt>Datasource</tt>.
dsDataRearrangement :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The total number of observations contained in the data files that the
--   <a>DataSource</a> references.
dsDataSizeInBytes :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Integer)

-- | The ID that is assigned to the <a>DataSource</a> during creation.
dsDataSourceId :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>BatchPrediction</a>. The
--   time is expressed in epoch time.
dsLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | A description of the most recent details about creating the
--   <a>DataSource</a>.
dsMessage :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>DataSource</a>.
dsName :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of data files referenced by the <a>DataSource</a>.
dsNumberOfFiles :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Integer)
dsRDSMetadata :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe RDSMetadata)
dsRedshiftMetadata :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe RedshiftMetadata)
dsRoleARN :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The current status of the <a>DataSource</a>. This element can have one
--   of the following values:
--   
--   PENDING - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a request to
--   create a <a>DataSource</a>. INPROGRESS - The creation process is
--   underway. FAILED - The request to create a <a>DataSource</a> did not
--   run to completion. It is not usable. COMPLETED - The creation process
--   completed successfully. DELETED - The <a>DataSource</a> is marked as
--   deleted. It is not usable.
dsStatus :: Lens' DataSource (Maybe EntityStatus)
data RDSDatabase

-- | <a>RDSDatabase</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdsdDatabaseName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdInstanceIdentifier</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
rdsdatabase :: Text -> Text -> RDSDatabase
rdsdDatabaseName :: Lens' RDSDatabase Text

-- | The ID of an RDS DB instance.
rdsdInstanceIdentifier :: Lens' RDSDatabase Text
data RDSDatabaseCredentials

-- | <a>RDSDatabaseCredentials</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdsdcPassword</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsdcUsername</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
rdsdatabaseCredentials :: Text -> Text -> RDSDatabaseCredentials
rdsdcPassword :: Lens' RDSDatabaseCredentials Text
rdsdcUsername :: Lens' RDSDatabaseCredentials Text
data MLModelFilterVariable

-- | Algorithm
MLMFVAlgorithm :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | CreatedAt
MLMFVCreatedAt :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | IAMUser
MLMFVIAMUser :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | LastUpdatedAt
MLMFVLastUpdatedAt :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | MLModelType
MLMFVMLModelType :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | Name
MLMFVName :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | RealtimeEndpointStatus
MLMFVRealtimeEndpointStatus :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | Status
MLMFVStatus :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | TrainingDataSourceId
MLMFVTrainingDataSourceId :: MLModelFilterVariable

-- | TrainingDataURI
MLMFVTrainingDataURI :: MLModelFilterVariable
data DataSourceFilterVariable

-- | CreatedAt
DataCreatedAt :: DataSourceFilterVariable

-- | DataLocationS3
DataDataLocationS3 :: DataSourceFilterVariable

-- | IAMUser
DataIAMUser :: DataSourceFilterVariable

-- | LastUpdatedAt
DataLastUpdatedAt :: DataSourceFilterVariable

-- | Name
DataName :: DataSourceFilterVariable

-- | Status
DataStatus :: DataSourceFilterVariable
data RedshiftDataSpec

-- | <a>RedshiftDataSpec</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdsDataRearrangement</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsDataSchema</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsDataSchemaUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsDatabaseCredentials</a> <tt>::</tt>
--   <a>RedshiftDatabaseCredentials</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsDatabaseInformation</a> <tt>::</tt>
--   <a>RedshiftDatabase</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsS3StagingLocation</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdsSelectSqlQuery</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
redshiftDataSpec :: RedshiftDatabase -> Text -> RedshiftDatabaseCredentials -> Text -> RedshiftDataSpec

-- | Describes the splitting specifications for a <a>DataSource</a>.
rdsDataRearrangement :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the schema for an Amazon Redshift <a>DataSource</a>.
rdsDataSchema :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the schema location for an Amazon Redshift
--   <a>DataSource</a>.
rdsDataSchemaUri :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) credentials that
--   are used connect to the Amazon Redshift database.
rdsDatabaseCredentials :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec RedshiftDatabaseCredentials

-- | Describes the <tt>DatabaseName</tt> and <tt>ClusterIdentifier</tt> for
--   an Amazon Redshift <a>DataSource</a>.
rdsDatabaseInformation :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec RedshiftDatabase

-- | Describes an Amazon S3 location to store the result set of the
--   <tt>SelectSqlQuery</tt> query.
rdsS3StagingLocation :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec Text

-- | Describes the SQL Query to execute on an Amazon Redshift database for
--   an Amazon Redshift <a>DataSource</a>.
rdsSelectSqlQuery :: Lens' RedshiftDataSpec Text
data Evaluation

-- | <a>Evaluation</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>eCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>eCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>eEvaluationDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>eEvaluationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>eInputDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>eLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>eMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>eMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>eName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>ePerformanceMetrics</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>PerformanceMetrics</a></li>
--   <li><a>eStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   </ul>
evaluation :: Evaluation

-- | The time that the <a>Evaluation</a> was created. The time is expressed
--   in epoch time.
eCreatedAt :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account that invoked the evaluation. The account type can
--   be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and Access Management
--   (IAM) user account.
eCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the <a>DataSource</a> that is used to evaluate the
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
eEvaluationDataSourceId :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID that is assigned to the <a>Evaluation</a> at creation.
eEvaluationId :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | The location and name of the data in Amazon Simple Storage Server
--   (Amazon S3) that is used in the evaluation.
eInputDataLocationS3 :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>Evaluation</a>. The time is
--   expressed in epoch time.
eLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID of the <a>MLModel</a> that is the focus of the evaluation.
eMLModelId :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | A description of the most recent details about evaluating the
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
eMessage :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>Evaluation</a>.
eName :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe Text)

-- | Measurements of how well the <a>MLModel</a> performed, using
--   observations referenced by the <a>DataSource</a>. One of the following
--   metrics is returned, based on the type of the MLModel:
--   
--   BinaryAUC: A binary <a>MLModel</a> uses the Area Under the Curve (AUC)
--   technique to measure performance.
--   
--   RegressionRMSE: A regression <a>MLModel</a> uses the Root Mean Square
--   Error (RMSE) technique to measure performance. RMSE measures the
--   difference between predicted and actual values for a single variable.
--   
--   MulticlassAvgFScore: A multiclass <a>MLModel</a> uses the F1 score
--   technique to measure performance.
--   
--   For more information about performance metrics, please see the
--   <a>AmazonMachine Learning Developer Guide</a>.
ePerformanceMetrics :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe PerformanceMetrics)

-- | The status of the evaluation. This element can have one of the
--   following values:
--   
--   <tt>PENDING</tt> - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a
--   request to evaluate an <a>MLModel</a>. <tt>INPROGRESS</tt> - The
--   evaluation is underway. <tt>FAILED</tt> - The request to evaluate an
--   <a>MLModel</a> did not run to completion. It is not usable.
--   <tt>COMPLETED</tt> - The evaluation process completed successfully.
--   <tt>DELETED</tt> - The <a>Evaluation</a> is marked as deleted. It is
--   not usable.
eStatus :: Lens' Evaluation (Maybe EntityStatus)
data RedshiftMetadata

-- | <a>RedshiftMetadata</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rmDatabaseUserName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rmRedshiftDatabase</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RedshiftDatabase</a></li>
--   <li><a>rmSelectSqlQuery</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
redshiftMetadata :: RedshiftMetadata
rmDatabaseUserName :: Lens' RedshiftMetadata (Maybe Text)
rmRedshiftDatabase :: Lens' RedshiftMetadata (Maybe RedshiftDatabase)

-- | The SQL query that is specified during
--   <tt>CreateDataSourceFromRedshift</tt>. Returns only if
--   <tt>Verbose</tt> is true in GetDataSourceInput.
rmSelectSqlQuery :: Lens' RedshiftMetadata (Maybe Text)
data MLModelType

-- | BINARY
Binary :: MLModelType

-- | MULTICLASS
Multiclass :: MLModelType

-- | REGRESSION
Regression :: MLModelType

instance AWSService MachineLearning


-- | Updates the <tt>BatchPredictionName</tt> of a <a>BatchPrediction</a>.
--   
--   You can use the <tt>GetBatchPrediction</tt> operation to view the
--   contents of the updated data element.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_UpdateBatchPrediction.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.UpdateBatchPrediction
data UpdateBatchPrediction

-- | <a>UpdateBatchPrediction</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ubpBatchPredictionId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>ubpBatchPredictionName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateBatchPrediction :: Text -> Text -> UpdateBatchPrediction

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>BatchPrediction</a> during creation.
ubpBatchPredictionId :: Lens' UpdateBatchPrediction Text

-- | A new user-supplied name or description of the <a>BatchPrediction</a>.
ubpBatchPredictionName :: Lens' UpdateBatchPrediction Text
data UpdateBatchPredictionResponse

-- | <a>UpdateBatchPredictionResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ubprBatchPredictionId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateBatchPredictionResponse :: UpdateBatchPredictionResponse

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>BatchPrediction</a> during creation. This
--   value should be identical to the value of the
--   <tt>BatchPredictionId</tt> in the request.
ubprBatchPredictionId :: Lens' UpdateBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq UpdateBatchPrediction
instance Ord UpdateBatchPrediction
instance Read UpdateBatchPrediction
instance Show UpdateBatchPrediction
instance Eq UpdateBatchPredictionResponse
instance Ord UpdateBatchPredictionResponse
instance Read UpdateBatchPredictionResponse
instance Show UpdateBatchPredictionResponse
instance Monoid UpdateBatchPredictionResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateBatchPredictionResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateBatchPrediction
instance ToJSON UpdateBatchPrediction
instance ToHeaders UpdateBatchPrediction
instance ToQuery UpdateBatchPrediction
instance ToPath UpdateBatchPrediction


-- | Updates the <tt>DataSourceName</tt> of a <a>DataSource</a>.
--   
--   You can use the <tt>GetDataSource</tt> operation to view the contents
--   of the updated data element.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_UpdateDataSource.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.UpdateDataSource
data UpdateDataSource

-- | <a>UpdateDataSource</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udsDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>udsDataSourceName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDataSource :: Text -> Text -> UpdateDataSource

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>DataSource</a> during creation.
udsDataSourceId :: Lens' UpdateDataSource Text

-- | A new user-supplied name or description of the <a>DataSource</a> that
--   will replace the current description.
udsDataSourceName :: Lens' UpdateDataSource Text
data UpdateDataSourceResponse

-- | <a>UpdateDataSourceResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udsrDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDataSourceResponse :: UpdateDataSourceResponse

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>DataSource</a> during creation. This value
--   should be identical to the value of the <tt>DataSourceID</tt> in the
--   request.
udsrDataSourceId :: Lens' UpdateDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq UpdateDataSource
instance Ord UpdateDataSource
instance Read UpdateDataSource
instance Show UpdateDataSource
instance Eq UpdateDataSourceResponse
instance Ord UpdateDataSourceResponse
instance Read UpdateDataSourceResponse
instance Show UpdateDataSourceResponse
instance Monoid UpdateDataSourceResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateDataSourceResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateDataSource
instance ToJSON UpdateDataSource
instance ToHeaders UpdateDataSource
instance ToQuery UpdateDataSource
instance ToPath UpdateDataSource


-- | Updates the <tt>EvaluationName</tt> of an <a>Evaluation</a>.
--   
--   You can use the <tt>GetEvaluation</tt> operation to view the contents
--   of the updated data element.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_UpdateEvaluation.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.UpdateEvaluation
data UpdateEvaluation

-- | <a>UpdateEvaluation</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ueEvaluationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>ueEvaluationName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateEvaluation :: Text -> Text -> UpdateEvaluation

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>Evaluation</a> during creation.
ueEvaluationId :: Lens' UpdateEvaluation Text

-- | A new user-supplied name or description of the <a>Evaluation</a> that
--   will replace the current content.
ueEvaluationName :: Lens' UpdateEvaluation Text
data UpdateEvaluationResponse

-- | <a>UpdateEvaluationResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>uerEvaluationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateEvaluationResponse :: UpdateEvaluationResponse

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>Evaluation</a> during creation. This value
--   should be identical to the value of the <a>Evaluation</a> in the
--   request.
uerEvaluationId :: Lens' UpdateEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq UpdateEvaluation
instance Ord UpdateEvaluation
instance Read UpdateEvaluation
instance Show UpdateEvaluation
instance Eq UpdateEvaluationResponse
instance Ord UpdateEvaluationResponse
instance Read UpdateEvaluationResponse
instance Show UpdateEvaluationResponse
instance Monoid UpdateEvaluationResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateEvaluationResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateEvaluation
instance ToJSON UpdateEvaluation
instance ToHeaders UpdateEvaluation
instance ToQuery UpdateEvaluation
instance ToPath UpdateEvaluation


-- | Updates the <tt>MLModelName</tt> and the <tt>ScoreThreshold</tt> of an
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
--   
--   You can use the <tt>GetMLModel</tt> operation to view the contents of
--   the updated data element.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_UpdateMLModel.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.UpdateMLModel
data UpdateMLModel

-- | <a>UpdateMLModel</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>umlmMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>umlmMLModelName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>umlmScoreThreshold</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Double</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateMLModel :: Text -> UpdateMLModel

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>MLModel</a> during creation.
umlmMLModelId :: Lens' UpdateMLModel Text

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>MLModel</a>.
umlmMLModelName :: Lens' UpdateMLModel (Maybe Text)

-- | The <tt>ScoreThreshold</tt> used in binary classification
--   <a>MLModel</a> that marks the boundary between a positive prediction
--   and a negative prediction.
--   
--   Output values greater than or equal to the <tt>ScoreThreshold</tt>
--   receive a positive result from the <a>MLModel</a>, such as
--   <tt>true</tt>. Output values less than the <tt>ScoreThreshold</tt>
--   receive a negative response from the <a>MLModel</a>, such as
--   <tt>false</tt>.
umlmScoreThreshold :: Lens' UpdateMLModel (Maybe Double)
data UpdateMLModelResponse

-- | <a>UpdateMLModelResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>umlmrMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateMLModelResponse :: UpdateMLModelResponse

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>MLModel</a> during creation. This value
--   should be identical to the value of the <tt>MLModelID</tt> in the
--   request.
umlmrMLModelId :: Lens' UpdateMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq UpdateMLModel
instance Ord UpdateMLModel
instance Read UpdateMLModel
instance Show UpdateMLModel
instance Eq UpdateMLModelResponse
instance Ord UpdateMLModelResponse
instance Read UpdateMLModelResponse
instance Show UpdateMLModelResponse
instance Monoid UpdateMLModelResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateMLModelResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateMLModel
instance ToJSON UpdateMLModel
instance ToHeaders UpdateMLModel
instance ToQuery UpdateMLModel
instance ToPath UpdateMLModel


-- | Generates a prediction for the observation using the specified
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
--   
--   Note Not all response parameters will be populated because this is
--   dependent on the type of requested model.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_Predict.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.Predict
data Predict

-- | <a>Predict</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>pMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>pPredictEndpoint</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>pRecord</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>HashMap</a> <a>Text</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
predict :: Text -> Text -> Predict

-- | A unique identifier of the <a>MLModel</a>.
pMLModelId :: Lens' Predict Text
pPredictEndpoint :: Lens' Predict Text
pRecord :: Lens' Predict (HashMap Text Text)
data PredictResponse

-- | <a>PredictResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>prPrediction</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Prediction</a></li>
--   </ul>
predictResponse :: PredictResponse
prPrediction :: Lens' PredictResponse (Maybe Prediction)
instance Eq Predict
instance Read Predict
instance Show Predict
instance Eq PredictResponse
instance Read PredictResponse
instance Show PredictResponse
instance FromJSON PredictResponse
instance AWSRequest Predict
instance ToJSON Predict
instance ToHeaders Predict
instance ToQuery Predict
instance ToPath Predict


-- | Returns an <a>MLModel</a> that includes detailed metadata, and data
--   source information as well as the current status of the
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
--   
--   <a>GetMLModel</a> provides results in normal or verbose format.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_GetMLModel.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.GetMLModel
data GetMLModel

-- | <a>GetMLModel</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gmlmMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmVerbose</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   </ul>
getMLModel :: Text -> GetMLModel

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>MLModel</a> at creation.
gmlmMLModelId :: Lens' GetMLModel Text

-- | Specifies whether the <a>GetMLModel</a> operation should return
--   <tt>Recipe</tt>.
--   
--   If true, <tt>Recipe</tt> is returned.
--   
--   If false, <tt>Recipe</tt> is not returned.
gmlmVerbose :: Lens' GetMLModel (Maybe Bool)
data GetMLModelResponse

-- | <a>GetMLModelResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gmlmrCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrEndpointInfo</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RealtimeEndpointInfo</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrInputDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrLogUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrMLModelType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>MLModelType</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrRecipe</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrSchema</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrScoreThreshold</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Double</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrScoreThresholdLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrSizeInBytes</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Integer</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrTrainingDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gmlmrTrainingParameters</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>HashMap</a>
--   <a>Text</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
getMLModelResponse :: GetMLModelResponse

-- | The time that the <a>MLModel</a> was created. The time is expressed in
--   epoch time.
gmlmrCreatedAt :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account from which the <a>MLModel</a> was created. The
--   account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and
--   Access Management (IAM) user account.
gmlmrCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The current endpoint of the <a>MLModel</a>
gmlmrEndpointInfo :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe RealtimeEndpointInfo)

-- | The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage
--   Service (Amazon S3).
gmlmrInputDataLocationS3 :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>MLModel</a>. The time is
--   expressed in epoch time.
gmlmrLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | A link to the file that contains logs of the <tt>CreateMLModel</tt>
--   operation.
gmlmrLogUri :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The MLModel ID which is same as the <tt>MLModelId</tt> in the request.
gmlmrMLModelId :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Identifies the <a>MLModel</a> category. The following are the
--   available types:
--   
--   REGRESSION -- Produces a numeric result. For example, "What listing
--   price should a house have?" BINARY -- Produces one of two possible
--   results. For example, "Is this an e-commerce website?" MULTICLASS --
--   Produces more than two possible results. For example, "Is this a HIGH,
--   LOW or MEDIUM risk trade?"
gmlmrMLModelType :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe MLModelType)

-- | Description of the most recent details about accessing the
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
gmlmrMessage :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>MLModel</a>.
gmlmrName :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The recipe to use when training the <a>MLModel</a>. The
--   <tt>Recipe</tt> provides detailed information about the observation
--   data to use during training, as well as manipulations to perform on
--   the observation data during training.
--   
--   Note This parameter is provided as part of the verbose format.
gmlmrRecipe :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The schema used by all of the data files referenced by the
--   <a>DataSource</a>.
--   
--   Note This parameter is provided as part of the verbose format.
gmlmrSchema :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The scoring threshold is used in binary classification
--   <a>MLModel</a>s, and marks the boundary between a positive prediction
--   and a negative prediction.
--   
--   Output values greater than or equal to the threshold receive a
--   positive result from the MLModel, such as <tt>true</tt>. Output values
--   less than the threshold receive a negative response from the MLModel,
--   such as <tt>false</tt>.
gmlmrScoreThreshold :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Double)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <tt>ScoreThreshold</tt>. The
--   time is expressed in epoch time.
gmlmrScoreThresholdLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe UTCTime)
gmlmrSizeInBytes :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Integer)

-- | The current status of the <a>MLModel</a>. This element can have one of
--   the following values:
--   
--   <tt>PENDING</tt> - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a
--   request to describe a <a>MLModel</a>. <tt>INPROGRESS</tt> - The
--   request is processing. <tt>FAILED</tt> - The request did not run to
--   completion. It is not usable. <tt>COMPLETED</tt> - The request
--   completed successfully. <tt>DELETED</tt> - The <a>MLModel</a> is
--   marked as deleted. It is not usable.
gmlmrStatus :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe EntityStatus)

-- | The ID of the training <a>DataSource</a>.
gmlmrTrainingDataSourceId :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of the training parameters in the <a>MLModel</a>. The list is
--   implemented as a map of key/value pairs.
--   
--   The following is the current set of training parameters:
--   
--   'sgd.l1RegularizationAmount' - Coefficient regularization L1 norm. It
--   controls overfitting the data by penalizing large coefficients. This
--   tends to drive coefficients to zero, resulting in a sparse feature
--   set. If you use this parameter, specify a small value, such as 1.0E-04
--   or 1.0E-08.
--   
--   The value is a double that ranges from 0 to MAX_DOUBLE. The default is
--   not to use L1 normalization. The parameter cannot be used when
--   <tt>L2</tt> is specified. Use this parameter sparingly.
--   
--   'sgd.l2RegularizationAmount' - Coefficient regularization L2 norm. It
--   controls overfitting the data by penalizing large coefficients. This
--   tends to drive coefficients to small, nonzero values. If you use this
--   parameter, specify a small value, such as 1.0E-04 or 1.0E-08.
--   
--   The value is a double that ranges from 0 to MAX_DOUBLE. The default is
--   not to use L2 normalization. This parameter cannot be used when
--   <tt>L1</tt> is specified. Use this parameter sparingly.
--   
--   'sgd.maxPasses' - The number of times that the training process
--   traverses the observations to build the <a>MLModel</a>. The value is
--   an integer that ranges from 1 to 10000. The default value is 10.
--   
--   'sgd.maxMLModelSizeInBytes' - The maximum allowed size of the model.
--   Depending on the input data, the model size might affect performance.
--   
--   The value is an integer that ranges from 100000 to 2147483648. The
--   default value is 33554432.
gmlmrTrainingParameters :: Lens' GetMLModelResponse (HashMap Text Text)
instance Eq GetMLModel
instance Ord GetMLModel
instance Read GetMLModel
instance Show GetMLModel
instance Eq GetMLModelResponse
instance Read GetMLModelResponse
instance Show GetMLModelResponse
instance FromJSON GetMLModelResponse
instance AWSRequest GetMLModel
instance ToJSON GetMLModel
instance ToHeaders GetMLModel
instance ToQuery GetMLModel
instance ToPath GetMLModel


-- | Returns an <a>Evaluation</a> that includes metadata as well as the
--   current status of the <a>Evaluation</a>.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_GetEvaluation.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.GetEvaluation
data GetEvaluation

-- | <a>GetEvaluation</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>geEvaluationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
getEvaluation :: Text -> GetEvaluation

-- | The ID of the <a>Evaluation</a> to retrieve. The evaluation of each
--   <a>MLModel</a> is recorded and cataloged. The ID provides the means to
--   access the information.
geEvaluationId :: Lens' GetEvaluation Text
data GetEvaluationResponse

-- | <a>GetEvaluationResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gerCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerEvaluationDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerEvaluationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerInputDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerLogUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerPerformanceMetrics</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>PerformanceMetrics</a></li>
--   <li><a>gerStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   </ul>
getEvaluationResponse :: GetEvaluationResponse

-- | The time that the <a>Evaluation</a> was created. The time is expressed
--   in epoch time.
gerCreatedAt :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account that invoked the evaluation. The account type can
--   be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and Access Management
--   (IAM) user account.
gerCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The <a>DataSource</a> used for this evaluation.
gerEvaluationDataSourceId :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The evaluation ID which is same as the <tt>EvaluationId</tt> in the
--   request.
gerEvaluationId :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage
--   Service (Amazon S3).
gerInputDataLocationS3 :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>BatchPrediction</a>. The
--   time is expressed in epoch time.
gerLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | A link to the file that contains logs of the <tt>CreateEvaluation</tt>
--   operation.
gerLogUri :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the <a>MLModel</a> that was the focus of the evaluation.
gerMLModelId :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A description of the most recent details about evaluating the
--   <a>MLModel</a>.
gerMessage :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>Evaluation</a>.
gerName :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Measurements of how well the <a>MLModel</a> performed using
--   observations referenced by the <a>DataSource</a>. One of the following
--   metric is returned based on the type of the <a>MLModel</a>:
--   
--   BinaryAUC: A binary <a>MLModel</a> uses the Area Under the Curve (AUC)
--   technique to measure performance.
--   
--   RegressionRMSE: A regression <a>MLModel</a> uses the Root Mean Square
--   Error (RMSE) technique to measure performance. RMSE measures the
--   difference between predicted and actual values for a single variable.
--   
--   MulticlassAvgFScore: A multiclass <a>MLModel</a> uses the F1 score
--   technique to measure performance.
--   
--   For more information about performance metrics, please see the
--   <a>AmazonMachine Learning Developer Guide</a>.
gerPerformanceMetrics :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe PerformanceMetrics)

-- | The status of the evaluation. This element can have one of the
--   following values:
--   
--   <tt>PENDING</tt> - Amazon Machine Language (Amazon ML) submitted a
--   request to evaluate an <a>MLModel</a>. <tt>INPROGRESS</tt> - The
--   evaluation is underway. <tt>FAILED</tt> - The request to evaluate an
--   <a>MLModel</a> did not run to completion. It is not usable.
--   <tt>COMPLETED</tt> - The evaluation process completed successfully.
--   <tt>DELETED</tt> - The <a>Evaluation</a> is marked as deleted. It is
--   not usable.
gerStatus :: Lens' GetEvaluationResponse (Maybe EntityStatus)
instance Eq GetEvaluation
instance Ord GetEvaluation
instance Read GetEvaluation
instance Show GetEvaluation
instance Monoid GetEvaluation
instance IsString GetEvaluation
instance Eq GetEvaluationResponse
instance Read GetEvaluationResponse
instance Show GetEvaluationResponse
instance FromJSON GetEvaluationResponse
instance AWSRequest GetEvaluation
instance ToJSON GetEvaluation
instance ToHeaders GetEvaluation
instance ToQuery GetEvaluation
instance ToPath GetEvaluation


-- | Returns a <a>DataSource</a> that includes metadata and data file
--   information, as well as the current status of the <a>DataSource</a>.
--   
--   <a>GetDataSource</a> provides results in normal or verbose format. The
--   verbose format adds the schema description and the list of files
--   pointed to by the DataSource to the normal format.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_GetDataSource.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.GetDataSource
data GetDataSource

-- | <a>GetDataSource</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gdsDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsVerbose</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   </ul>
getDataSource :: Text -> GetDataSource

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>DataSource</a> at creation.
gdsDataSourceId :: Lens' GetDataSource Text

-- | Specifies whether the <a>GetDataSource</a> operation should return
--   <tt>DataSourceSchema</tt>.
--   
--   If true, <tt>DataSourceSchema</tt> is returned.
--   
--   If false, <tt>DataSourceSchema</tt> is not returned.
gdsVerbose :: Lens' GetDataSource (Maybe Bool)
data GetDataSourceResponse

-- | <a>GetDataSourceResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gdsrComputeStatistics</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrDataRearrangement</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrDataSizeInBytes</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Integer</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrDataSourceSchema</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrLogUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrNumberOfFiles</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Integer</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrRDSMetadata</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RDSMetadata</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrRedshiftMetadata</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>RedshiftMetadata</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrRoleARN</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gdsrStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   </ul>
getDataSourceResponse :: GetDataSourceResponse

-- | The parameter is <tt>true</tt> if statistics need to be generated from
--   the observation data.
gdsrComputeStatistics :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Bool)

-- | The time that the <a>DataSource</a> was created. The time is expressed
--   in epoch time.
gdsrCreatedAt :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account from which the <a>DataSource</a> was created. The
--   account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and
--   Access Management (IAM) user account.
gdsrCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage
--   Service (Amazon S3).
gdsrDataLocationS3 :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A JSON string that captures the splitting rearrangement requirement of
--   the <a>DataSource</a>.
gdsrDataRearrangement :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The total size of observations in the data files.
gdsrDataSizeInBytes :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Integer)

-- | The ID assigned to the <a>DataSource</a> at creation. This value
--   should be identical to the value of the <tt>DataSourceId</tt> in the
--   request.
gdsrDataSourceId :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The schema used by all of the data files of this <a>DataSource</a>.
--   
--   Note This parameter is provided as part of the verbose format.
gdsrDataSourceSchema :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to the <a>DataSource</a>. The time is
--   expressed in epoch time.
gdsrLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | A link to the file containining logs of either create
--   <a>DataSource</a> operation.
gdsrLogUri :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the most recent details about creating the
--   <a>DataSource</a>.
gdsrMessage :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>DataSource</a>.
gdsrName :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of data files referenced by the <a>DataSource</a>.
gdsrNumberOfFiles :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Integer)
gdsrRDSMetadata :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe RDSMetadata)
gdsrRedshiftMetadata :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe RedshiftMetadata)
gdsrRoleARN :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The current status of the <a>DataSource</a>. This element can have one
--   of the following values:
--   
--   <tt>PENDING</tt> - Amazon Machine Language (Amazon ML) submitted a
--   request to create a <a>DataSource</a>. <tt>INPROGRESS</tt> - The
--   creation process is underway. <tt>FAILED</tt> - The request to create
--   a <a>DataSource</a> did not run to completion. It is not usable.
--   <tt>COMPLETED</tt> - The creation process completed successfully.
--   <tt>DELETED</tt> - The <a>DataSource</a> is marked as deleted. It is
--   not usable.
gdsrStatus :: Lens' GetDataSourceResponse (Maybe EntityStatus)
instance Eq GetDataSource
instance Ord GetDataSource
instance Read GetDataSource
instance Show GetDataSource
instance Eq GetDataSourceResponse
instance Read GetDataSourceResponse
instance Show GetDataSourceResponse
instance FromJSON GetDataSourceResponse
instance AWSRequest GetDataSource
instance ToJSON GetDataSource
instance ToHeaders GetDataSource
instance ToQuery GetDataSource
instance ToPath GetDataSource


-- | Returns a <a>BatchPrediction</a> that includes detailed metadata,
--   status, and data file information for a 'Batch Prediction' request.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_GetBatchPrediction.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.GetBatchPrediction
data GetBatchPrediction

-- | <a>GetBatchPrediction</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gbpBatchPredictionId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
getBatchPrediction :: Text -> GetBatchPrediction

-- | An ID assigned to the <a>BatchPrediction</a> at creation.
gbpBatchPredictionId :: Lens' GetBatchPrediction Text
data GetBatchPredictionResponse

-- | <a>GetBatchPredictionResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gbprBatchPredictionDataSourceId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprBatchPredictionId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprCreatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprCreatedByIamUser</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprInputDataLocationS3</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprLastUpdatedAt</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprLogUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprMLModelId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprOutputUri</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gbprStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>EntityStatus</a></li>
--   </ul>
getBatchPredictionResponse :: GetBatchPredictionResponse

-- | The ID of the <a>DataSource</a> that was used to create the
--   <a>BatchPrediction</a>.
gbprBatchPredictionDataSourceId :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | An ID assigned to the <a>BatchPrediction</a> at creation. This value
--   should be identical to the value of the <tt>BatchPredictionID</tt> in
--   the request.
gbprBatchPredictionId :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the <a>BatchPrediction</a> was created. The time is
--   expressed in epoch time.
gbprCreatedAt :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The AWS user account that invoked the <a>BatchPrediction</a>. The
--   account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and
--   Access Management (IAM) user account.
gbprCreatedByIamUser :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage
--   Service (Amazon S3).
gbprInputDataLocationS3 :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of the most recent edit to <a>BatchPrediction</a>. The time
--   is expressed in epoch time.
gbprLastUpdatedAt :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | A link to the file that contains logs of the
--   <tt>CreateBatchPrediction</tt> operation.
gbprLogUri :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the <a>MLModel</a> that generated predictions for the
--   <a>BatchPrediction</a> request.
gbprMLModelId :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A description of the most recent details about processing the batch
--   prediction request.
gbprMessage :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A user-supplied name or description of the <a>BatchPrediction</a>.
gbprName :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The location of an Amazon S3 bucket or directory to receive the
--   operation results.
gbprOutputUri :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The status of the <a>BatchPrediction</a>, which can be one of the
--   following values:
--   
--   <tt>PENDING</tt> - Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML) submitted a
--   request to generate batch predictions. <tt>INPROGRESS</tt> - The batch
--   predictions are in progress. <tt>FAILED</tt> - The request to perform
--   a batch prediction did not run to completion. It is not usable.
--   <tt>COMPLETED</tt> - The batch prediction process completed
--   successfully. <tt>DELETED</tt> - The <a>BatchPrediction</a> is marked
--   as deleted. It is not usable.
gbprStatus :: Lens' GetBatchPredictionResponse (Maybe EntityStatus)
instance Eq GetBatchPrediction
instance Ord GetBatchPrediction
instance Read GetBatchPrediction
instance Show GetBatchPrediction
instance Monoid GetBatchPrediction
instance IsString GetBatchPrediction
instance Eq GetBatchPredictionResponse
instance Read GetBatchPredictionResponse
instance Show GetBatchPredictionResponse
instance FromJSON GetBatchPredictionResponse
instance AWSRequest GetBatchPrediction
instance ToJSON GetBatchPrediction
instance ToHeaders GetBatchPrediction
instance ToQuery GetBatchPrediction
instance ToPath GetBatchPrediction


-- | Returns a list of <a>MLModel</a> that match the search criteria in the
--   request.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeMLModels.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.DescribeMLModels
data DescribeMLModels

-- | <a>DescribeMLModels</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dmlmEQ</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmFilterVariable</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>MLModelFilterVariable</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmGE</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmGT</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmLE</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmLT</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmLimit</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Natural</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmNE</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmNextToken</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmPrefix</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmSortOrder</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>SortOrder</a></li>
--   </ul>
describeMLModels :: DescribeMLModels

-- | The equal to operator. The <a>MLModel</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that exactly match the value specified
--   with <a>EQ</a>.
dmlmEQ :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | Use one of the following variables to filter a list of <a>MLModel</a>:
--   
--   <tt>CreatedAt</tt> - Sets the search criteria to <a>MLModel</a>
--   creation date. <a>Status</a> - Sets the search criteria to
--   <a>MLModel</a> status. <tt>Name</tt> - Sets the search criteria to the
--   contents of <a>MLModel</a> <tt>Name</tt>. <tt>IAMUser</tt> - Sets the
--   search criteria to the user account that invoked the <a>MLModel</a>
--   creation. <tt>TrainingDataSourceId</tt> - Sets the search criteria to
--   the <a>DataSource</a> used to train one or more <a>MLModel</a>.
--   <a>RealtimeEndpointStatus</a> - Sets the search criteria to the
--   <a>MLModel</a> real-time endpoint status. <a>MLModelType</a> - Sets
--   the search criteria to <a>MLModel</a> type: binary, regression, or
--   multi-class. <a>Algorithm</a> - Sets the search criteria to the
--   algorithm that the <a>MLModel</a> uses. <tt>TrainingDataURI</tt> -
--   Sets the search criteria to the data file(s) used in training a
--   <a>MLModel</a>. The URL can identify either a file or an Amazon Simple
--   Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket or directory.
dmlmFilterVariable :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe MLModelFilterVariable)

-- | The greater than or equal to operator. The <a>MLModel</a> results will
--   have <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are greater than or equal to
--   the value specified with <tt>GE</tt>.
dmlmGE :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | The greater than operator. The <a>MLModel</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are greater than the value
--   specified with <a>GT</a>.
dmlmGT :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | The less than or equal to operator. The <a>MLModel</a> results will
--   have <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are less than or equal to the
--   value specified with <tt>LE</tt>.
dmlmLE :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | The less than operator. The <a>MLModel</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are less than the value specified
--   with <a>LT</a>.
dmlmLT :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of pages of information to include in the result. The range
--   of acceptable values is 1 through 100. The default value is 100.
dmlmLimit :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Natural)

-- | The not equal to operator. The <a>MLModel</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values not equal to the value specified with
--   <tt>NE</tt>.
dmlmNE :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the page in the paginated results.
dmlmNextToken :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | A string that is found at the beginning of a variable, such as
--   <tt>Name</tt> or <tt>Id</tt>.
--   
--   For example, an <a>MLModel</a> could have the <tt>Name</tt>
--   '2014-09-09-HolidayGiftMailer'. To search for this <a>MLModel</a>,
--   select <tt>Name</tt> for the <tt>FilterVariable</tt> and any of the
--   following strings for the <tt>Prefix</tt>:
--   
--   2014-09
--   
--   2014-09-09
--   
--   2014-09-09-Holiday
dmlmPrefix :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe Text)

-- | A two-value parameter that determines the sequence of the resulting
--   list of <a>MLModel</a>.
--   
--   <tt>asc</tt> - Arranges the list in ascending order (A-Z, 0-9).
--   <tt>dsc</tt> - Arranges the list in descending order (Z-A, 9-0).
--   Results are sorted by <tt>FilterVariable</tt>.
dmlmSortOrder :: Lens' DescribeMLModels (Maybe SortOrder)
data DescribeMLModelsResponse

-- | <a>DescribeMLModelsResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dmlmrNextToken</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dmlmrResults</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>MLModel</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
describeMLModelsResponse :: DescribeMLModelsResponse

-- | The ID of the next page in the paginated results that indicates at
--   least one more page follows.
dmlmrNextToken :: Lens' DescribeMLModelsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of <a>MLModel</a> that meet the search criteria.
dmlmrResults :: Lens' DescribeMLModelsResponse [MLModel]
instance Eq DescribeMLModels
instance Read DescribeMLModels
instance Show DescribeMLModels
instance Eq DescribeMLModelsResponse
instance Read DescribeMLModelsResponse
instance Show DescribeMLModelsResponse
instance AWSPager DescribeMLModels
instance FromJSON DescribeMLModelsResponse
instance AWSRequest DescribeMLModels
instance ToJSON DescribeMLModels
instance ToHeaders DescribeMLModels
instance ToQuery DescribeMLModels
instance ToPath DescribeMLModels


-- | Returns a list of <a>DescribeEvaluations</a> that match the search
--   criteria in the request.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://http://docs.aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeEvaluations.html</a>
module Network.AWS.MachineLearning.DescribeEvaluations
data DescribeEvaluations

-- | <a>DescribeEvaluations</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>deEQ</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deFilterVariable</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>EvaluationFilterVariable</a></li>
--   <li><a>deGE</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deGT</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deLE</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deLT</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deLimit</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Natural</a></li>
--   <li><a>deNE</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deNextToken</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dePrefix</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>deSortOrder</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>SortOrder</a></li>
--   </ul>
describeEvaluations :: DescribeEvaluations

-- | The equal to operator. The <a>Evaluation</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that exactly match the value specified
--   with <a>EQ</a>.
deEQ :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | Use one of the following variable to filter a list of
--   <a>Evaluation</a> objects:
--   
--   <tt>CreatedAt</tt> - Sets the search criteria to the <a>Evaluation</a>
--   creation date. <a>Status</a> - Sets the search criteria to the
--   <a>Evaluation</a> status. <tt>Name</tt> - Sets the search criteria to
--   the contents of <a>Evaluation</a> <tt>Name</tt>. <tt>IAMUser</tt> -
--   Sets the search criteria to the user account that invoked an
--   <a>Evaluation</a>. <tt>MLModelId</tt> - Sets the search criteria to
--   the <a>MLModel</a> that was evaluated. <tt>DataSourceId</tt> - Sets
--   the search criteria to the <a>DataSource</a> used in
--   <a>Evaluation</a>. <tt>DataUri</tt> - Sets the search criteria to the
--   data file(s) used in <a>Evaluation</a>. The URL can identify either a
--   file or an Amazon Simple Storage Solution (Amazon S3) bucket or
--   directory.
deFilterVariable :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe EvaluationFilterVariable)

-- | The greater than or equal to operator. The <a>Evaluation</a> results
--   will have <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are greater than or
--   equal to the value specified with <tt>GE</tt>.
deGE :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | The greater than operator. The <a>Evaluation</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are greater than the value
--   specified with <a>GT</a>.
deGT :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | The less than or equal to operator. The <a>Evaluation</a> results will
--   have <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are less than or equal to the
--   value specified with <tt>LE</tt>.
deLE :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | The less than operator. The <a>Evaluation</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values that are less than the value specified
--   with <a>LT</a>.
deLT :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | The maximum number of <a>Evaluation</a> to include in the result.
deLimit :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Natural)

-- | The not equal to operator. The <a>Evaluation</a> results will have
--   <tt>FilterVariable</tt> values not equal to the value specified with
--   <tt>NE</tt>.
deNE :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the page in the paginated results.
deNextToken :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | A string that is found at the beginning of a variable, such as
--   <tt>Name</tt> or <tt>Id</tt>.
--   
--   For example, an <a>Evaluation</a> could have the <tt>Name</tt>
--   '2014-09-09-HolidayGiftMailer'. To search for this <a>Evaluation</a>,
--   select <tt>Name</tt> for the <tt>FilterVariable</tt> and any of the
--   following strings for the <tt>Prefix</tt>:
--   
--   2014-09
--   
--   2014-09-09
--   
--   2014-09-09-Holiday
dePrefix :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe Text)

-- | A two-value parameter that determines the sequence of the resulting
--   list of <a>Evaluation</a>.
--   
--   <tt>asc</tt> - Arranges the list in ascending order (A-Z, 0-9).
--   <tt>dsc</tt> - Arranges the list in descending order (Z-A, 9-0).
--   Results are sorted by <tt>FilterVariable</tt>.
deSortOrder :: Lens' DescribeEvaluations (Maybe SortOrder)
data DescribeEvaluationsResponse

-- | <a>DescribeEvaluationsResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>derNextToken</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>derResults</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Evaluation</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
describeEvaluationsResponse :: DescribeEvaluationsResponse

-- | The ID of the next page in the paginated results that indicates at
--   least one more page follows.
derNextToken :: Lens' DescribeEvaluationsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of <a>Evaluation</a> that meet the search criteria.
derResults :: Lens' DescribeEvaluationsResponse [Evaluation]
instance Eq DescribeEvaluations
instance Read DescribeEvaluations
instance Show DescribeEvaluations

instance AWSRequest DescribeEvaluations
